commands.afkmarker.set_afk_timeout.succe: Players will be marked as AFK after %s minute(s) of inactivity.
commands.afkmarker.mark_afk.success: You are now marked as AFK until you move onto a different block.
afkmarker.no_longer_afk: You are no longer marked as AFK.
resourcepack.afkmarker.vanilla.name: Vanilla AFK Icons
resourcepack.afkmarker.vanilla.descripti: Display the vanilla moon instead of a crescent moon for AFK players
